attributes.action: To stop funding the BBC with public money via the TV license
attributes.background: The BBC is failing in its duty as a publicly funded company to broadcast news, current affairs programs and party political broadcasts in a fair and impartial manner and in doing so cannot expect to be partially funded by the general public via the TV license fee

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/331189
